name: Midnight Cruise (itch)
description:
HELLO WORLD

A Key: Left
D Key: Right

This is my first ever Unity game
I made it in about a week
It is basically a test, and also self encouragement to simply get into the habit of making stuff, learning new things, and getting it published for feedback

Everything in the game is made by me, and this is my first instance of it all:
First time to use Blender, first time to use Unity (beyond just playing with tutorials), first time trying to get coding to work
That being said, the code is all based on tutorials by Brackeys

The concept changed several times, and I dropped a lot of features because they weren't working how I wanted them to
I ultimately decided to publish as-is  so that I can move onto developing concepts I'm more passionate about
But in time I do intend to come back and remaster this to reinstate the dropped ideas
(Dropped ideas include; narrative told by surroundings, pitch black level w/ only headlights, level unlock, endless-easy mode)

The game is free as it's not really a full game
But feel free to show some love at
Ko-fi.com/konakuma
